price: 1. Ceux qui ont mécru et ont détourné (les autres) du chemin d’Allah, (Allah) rendra nulles leurs œuvres.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: He will cause to be lost
